import React, {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import LibraryImage from '../../asserts/img/library.jpg' import Modal from 'react-modal' export class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { fullname: '', fullnameValidation: false, card: '', cardValidation: false, email: '', emailValidation: false, phone: '', title: '', titleValidation: false, message: '', messageValidation: false, showResponse: false, responseMessage: 'Your message is sent to our library. Thank you for your information' } } async componentDidMount() { if (localStorage.getItem("signInStatus") == 'true') { try { const url = 'http://localhost:2000/api/user/info?userid=' + localStorage.getItem("userID") const response = await fetch(url) if (response.ok) { const data = await response.json() this.setState({ fullname: data.data.name, card: localStorage.getItem("userID"), email: data.data.email, phone: data.data.phone }) } } catch(e) { console.log(e) } } } onNameChange = e => { if (e.target.value != "") { this.setState({fullnameValidation: true}) } else { this.setState({fullnameValidation: false}) } this.setState({fullname: e.target.value}) } onCardChange = e => { if (e.target.value != "") { this.setState({cardValidation: true}) } else { this.setState({cardValidation: false}) } this.setState({card: e.target.value}) } onEmailChange = e => { if (e.target.value != "") { if (e.target.value.includes("@")) { this.setState({emailValidation: true}) } else { this.setState({emailValidation: false}) } } else { this.setState({emailValidation: false}) } this.setState({email: e.target.value}) } onPhoneChange = e => { this.setState({phone: e.target.value}) } onTitleChange = e => { if (e.target.value != "") { this.setState({titleValidation: true}) } else { this.setState({titleValidation: false}) } this.setState({title: e.target.value}) } onMessageChange = e => { if (e.target.value != "") { this.setState({messageValidation: true}) } else { this.setState({messageValidation: false}) } this.setState({message: e.target.value}) } onHandleSubmit = e => { if (this.state.titleValidation == true && this.state.messageValidation == true) { e.preventDefault() this.setState({showResponse: true}) } } onOtherHandleSubmit = e => { if (this.state.fullnameValidation == true && this.state.cardValidation == true && this.state.emailValidation == true && this.state.titleValidation == true && this.state.messageValidation == true) { e.preventDefault() this.setState({showResponse: true}) } } render() { if (localStorage.getItem("signInStatus") == 'true') { return(

CONTACT
